div.p: Who is subscribed to a channel determines who receives the messages sent there. All non-[guest](/help/guest-users) users can view public channels and subscribe themselves. Organization administrators can [configure](/help/configure-who-can-invite-to-channels) who can subscribe and unsubscribe other users to channels.

li.p: Click on the **gear** () icon in the upper right corner of the web or desktop app.
Click [All channels](/#channels/all) in the upper left.
Select the **Subscribers** tab on the right.

div.p: You can also hover over a channel in the left sidebar, click on the **ellipsis** (), and select **Channel settings** to access the **Subscribers** tab.

li.p: Click on a channel in the left sidebar.
View subscribers in the **In this channel** section in the right sidebar. If the section is collapsed, click **In this channel** to reveal it.

div.p: To see the full list of subscribers for a channel that has more than 600 people subscribed, scroll to the bottom of the **In this channel** section, and click **View all subscribers**.
